刕字的基本解释

刕
lí
姓氏。

刕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lí］
［《廣韻》力脂切，平脂，來。］
姓。亦为百济八姓之一。

刕字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【刀字部】　刕； 康熙笔画：6； 页码：页137第24
【唐韻】力脂切【集韻】良脂切，?音棃。姓也。出蜀刀達之後，避難改爲刕字。又【六書故】刕又作剺，或作㓿。又【集韻】憐題切，音黎。義同。㓿字原刻从刀。本书有䵑?，無㓿。

刕字的源字形

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
刕字的起名意思

姓氏。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [lí]
["Guangyun" Lizhi cut, flat fat, come. ]
name. It is also one of the eight surnames of Baekje.
Mow
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [Knife word department] 　刕; Kangxi strokes: 6; Page number: page 137-24
[Tang Yun] Lizhi cut [Jiyun] Liangzhi cut,? Yindi. Last name also. After leaving the Shudao Dao, the refuge was changed to 刕字. Also [Six Books Gu] 刕 and 剺, or 㓿. [Ji Yun] pity the question, sound Li. The same meaning. The word 㓿 was originally carved from the knife. This book has 嵑?, no 㓿.
Mow
